text: I had my wisdom tooth extraction done by Dr. Bala and Dr. Anju, and they did an excellent job! The procedure was smooth, handled with great care, and they made sure I was comfortable throughout. Both doctors were very professional, patient, and explained everything clearly before and after the extraction.

We recently visited Magizh dental care for milk teeth extraction of our child. Doctor Anjugam was very child friendly, kind and she explained things to us in a detailed and polite way.  Also she did handle the procedure really well. The clinic is very neat and the staffs are kind. The cost is reasonable too. Would recommend the clinic for adults as well.  Thank you Dr.Anjugam.......

I had a filling and a cleaning done at Magizh dental centre. It was aa hassle free experience. The dentist was very knowledgeable and clearly articulated issues with my teeth. Reasonable price as well. Would recommend people staying around Palavakkam and Kottivakkam area.

Based on my friends suggestion i took tooth cleaning from Magizh dental, It is most recommended place to get professional and perfect dental support. I was treated by Dr.Anju, She was explaining about the treatment before and take step by step kindly. Right place for your dental support!

I visited the clinic for crown displacement and teeth cleaning. The experience was smooth and professional. The staff was courteous, and the dentist took time to explain the procedure clearly. The treatment was done with care and no discomfort. I’m happy with the results and would recommend this clinic for dental care needs.

I had  an excellent experience at
Magizh  Dental care at neelankarai. The entire team is professional, caring and attentive. The doctors explained every procedure clearly and made sure I was comfortable throughout. I really appreciate their follow up after the treatment - it shows how much they care about their patients well being. Highly recommend this clinic for anyone looking for quality dental care.

“Impressive and professional service! Dr. Prathiba and her team are exceptionally skilled and caring. The clinic is well-equipped with the latest technology, ensuring a comfortable and world-class dental experience.”

Excellent Dental care. Dr. Pratibha is very friendly person and I had a wonderful experience at Magizh Dental care . gentle and explained every step of the procedure clearly, making me feel comfortable and at ease. The staff were friendly and professional,
I highly recommend this clinic .

I had my wisdom tooth extracted here, and I’m really happy that I chose this place. I thought the procedure would be painful, but it was completely painless! The doctors were so kind, caring, and made me feel very comfortable throughout the treatment

The treatment experience was very pleasant, but my problem was first they ask 200 for doctor counselling. Then they said 800 for cavity filling cause it's mild, I thought 800 for both the teeth. But then after all the process they charged 1600 for both teeth. Only if they told me clearly I would have came another day. Other than that the experience was good and the staffs were polite.
